sect2.title: Installation du noyau Linux
sect2.para: We won't be compiling a new kernel image yet. We'll do that after we have finished the installation of the basic system software in this chapter. But because certain software needs the kernel header files, we're going to unpack the kernel archive now and set it up so that we can compile the packages that need the kernel.
Le fichier de configuration du noyau est créé en lançant la commande suivante:

screen.userinput: ln -s /static/bin/pwd /bin/pwd && make mrproper && make include/linux/version.h && make symlinks && mkdir /usr/include/asm && cp include/asm/* /usr/include/asm && cp -R include/asm-generic /usr/include && cp -R include/linux /usr/include && touch /usr/include/linux/autoconf.h && rm /bin/pwd
